text: The legendary Shieldmaiden of Skjold is as much the King's asset as her popularity is his threat.
With a mighty cry Oda organizes her Huskarls and Shield-Maidens in line, forming an impenetrable wall of shields and meat.
Norscans flock to Horvenghaast to trade and partake in the famed "Duelling Circles," rooftop fighting rituals sacred to Khorne.
Oda Windbreaker has sailed every corner of the Bjornling coast, serving as it's guardian and champion.
Steel imported from Pack Ice Bay is used to forge the finest shields for the King's frontlines.
The deep bellows of Oda's Horn break winds and clouds as they invigor friendly troops.
Not many are trusted with dealing with the High King's affairs, yet as his trusted advisor Oda deals with trivial mundane management such as keeping the savage marauders in check.
The elite of Skjold are the Huskarls and Shield Maidens that follow Oda in to battle, hailing from the harsh area known as Hafkael's Yard.
A rival champion once mutterd: "No living man may hinder me". His head now rests on Oda's mantle.
With a mighty cry Oda organizes her Huskarls and Shield-Maidens in line, forming a impenetrable wall of shields and meat.
Global recruitment duration: %+n turn for Marauder Champions
